spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall room zoning matches the 2D plan (master suite bottom-left, theatre left-center, kitchen/pantry center, living right, alfresco top-right, garage bottom-right). However, door locations/orientations are not faithfully represented (many doors are missing and represented as open voids), and exterior window placement on the right facade appears simplified vs. the 2D plan (window counts/locations do not clearly match). Some proportion drift is visible (alfresco/living and central circulation widths look adjusted compared to the plan).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall networks and adjacencies are largely consistent with the 2D plan (laundry/bath/WC cluster adjacent to the secondary bedrooms; pantry attached to kitchen; living connected to alfresco; garage connected near entry). Wall thickness looks mostly consistent. Major fidelity loss comes from incorrect/absent door embedding (door leaves/swing positions not modeled, several openings treated as doorless passages), reducing verification of correct door placement.

furniture_mapping.notes: Key furniture groupings are present in the correct rooms (beds in bedrooms, kitchen island/benches, living seating, theatre seating). However, furniture is highly schematic/blocky and several items appear loosely placed and not dimensionally faithful to the 2D implied clearances (scale consistency is only moderate).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric view is correct and readable. Projection is mostly consistent (slight perspective/visual exaggeration). Lighting is clean and uniform. Geometry is generally clean with minimal distortions. Visual clarity is good, though heavy text overlays reduce architectural legibility for openings (doors/windows).

detected_errors.description: Most internal doors are missing as modeled objects (door leaves/swing not shown) and many are represented as open voids, preventing faithful door verification.
Exterior window placement on the right elevation appears simplified and does not clearly match the 2D plan’s window distribution for living/alfresco zones (count/position likely mismatched).
Noticeable proportion drift: alfresco-to-living relationship and some circulation widths appear altered compared to the 2D plan (rooms feel slightly reshaped).
Rendering/overlay artifact: large text labels on floors reduce clarity of architectural elements (especially openings), impacting verifiability.
